oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Church Street at Capitol Boulevard Looking East, c.1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Church Street at Capitol Boulevard, looking east in downtown Nashville. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority, c.1980. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
